mapper.select: select U.USERID, U.USERNAME, U.USERALIAS, U.HRCODE, U.HRDEPTNAME, U.HRDEPTCODE, U.PHONE, D.DEPTID, D.DEPTNAME, D.DEPTCODE, D.TYPE , D.PDEPTID , D2.DEPTID as PDEPTID, D2.DEPTNAME as PDEPTNAME, D2.DEPTCODE as PDEPTCODE, D2.TYPE as PTYPE from bg_sys_user u LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D ON U.HRDEPTCODE=D.DEPTCODE LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D2 ON D2.DEPTID=D.PDEPTID where u.valid = 1 and u.state = 0 and exists (select * from TB_PRIV_USER_R_ROLE r where r.valid = '1' and r.role_id = #{roleId} and r.user_id = u.userid) and exists (select * from tb_priv_appr_user_r_dept p where p.valid = '1' and p.dept_id = #{deptId} and p.user_id = u.userid)

select U.USERID, U.USERNAME, U.USERALIAS, U.HRCODE, U.HRDEPTNAME, U.HRDEPTCODE, U.PHONE, D.DEPTID, D.DEPTNAME, D.DEPTCODE, D.TYPE , D.PDEPTID , D2.DEPTID as PDEPTID, D2.DEPTNAME as PDEPTNAME, D2.DEPTCODE as PDEPTCODE, D2.TYPE as PTYPE from bg_sys_user u LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D ON U.HRDEPTCODE=D.DEPTCODE LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D2 ON D2.DEPTID=D.PDEPTID where u.valid = 1 and u.state = 0 and exists (select * from TB_PRIV_USER_R_ROLE r where r.valid = '1' and r.role_id = #{roleId} and r.user_id = u.userid)

select T.ID, T.USER_ID, T.DEPT_ID, D.DEPTNAME, D.TYPE, T.FUNCTION_TYPE from TB_PRIV_MGR_USER_R_DEPT T INNER JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D ON T.DEPT_ID=D.DEPTID where T.VALID= '1' AND D.VALID= '1' and USER_ID = #{userId} and FUNCTION_TYPE = #{type}
select APPROVE_ROLE from TB_WL_RULE where VALID= '1' and STATUS='1' and FUNCTION_TYPE=#{type} and NODE = #{node}
